\phi\right), \cr A &=& {\sqrt{3} \over 2} j r^2
\sigma^3_L \

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2 &=& -f(r)\, dt^2 - g(r)\,  r \sigma^3_L dt - h(r)\, r^2
(\sigma^3_L)^2 \cr && + k(r)\,   dr^2 + {r^2 \over 4} \left( d
\theta^2 + d \psi^2 + d \phi^2 + 2 \cos\theta\, d \psi d
\phi\right), \cr 
A &=& {\sqrt{3} \over 2} j r^2 \sigma^3_L \ .
\label{ansatz}
